plain_text:
The resurgent Poulter will have that chance Sunday after shooting a 4 under par 67 to take a one shot 
lead into the final round and putting him in the position for his second victory in three weeks.
Poulter and his chasers will have a quick turn around Sunday with tour officials starting play at 
7 am and going off in threesomes on both tees because of expected weater on the golf course in the afternoon.
It's just nice to play godo golf Poulter said.
